HHNBRG_creation_primary_peoples_congress_category = {

	HHNBRG_creation_primary_peoples_congress = {

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		
		available = {
		}

		visible = {
		}
		
		cost = 15
		days_remove = 30
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		remove_effect = {
			set_country_flag = primary_peoples_congress_is_created
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_primary_peoples_congress_tt
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 30
		}
	}
}
	
HHNBRG_national_peoples_congresses_category = {	
	
	HHNBRG_expansion_power_congress = {

		icon = generic_civil_support
		
		available = {
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = HHNBRG_expansion_power_congress_trigger_tt		
				set_temp_variable = { custom_cost = 10 }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { custom_cost = custom_cost_minus }
				set_temp_variable = { cost_multiply = 10 }
				set_temp_variable = { total_num_of_congresses_var = num_of_congresses_var }
				add_to_temp_variable = { total_num_of_congresses_var = compensatory_value }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { total_num_of_congresses_var = num_of_congresses_no_check_var }
				multiply_temp_variable = { cost_multiply = total_num_of_congresses_var }
				add_to_temp_variable = { custom_cost = cost_multiply }
				check_variable = { custom_cost > 39 }
			}
		}

		visible = {
		}
		
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			set_temp_variable = { stability_cost = stability }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { stability_cost = modifier@stability_factor }
			check_variable = { stability_cost > 0.1 }
			#for text
			set_temp_variable = { text_stability = stability }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { text_stability = modifier@stability_factor }
			multiply_temp_variable = { text_stability = 100 }
		}
		custom_cost_text = expansion_power_congress_cost
		
		days_remove = 10
		
		remove_effect = {
			add_to_variable = { custom_cost_minus = 30 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_expansion_power_congress_effect_tt
		}
		
		complete_effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				add_stability = -0.1
				hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.902 } }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_stability < 0.1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_stability < 0.2
			}
		}
	}
	
	
	#### РЕШЕНИЯ НА СТЕЙТЫ ####
	
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_1 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			1 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			1 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			1 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_2 = {

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			9 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			factor = 1

				factor = 25

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_28 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			28 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			28 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			28 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_47 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			47 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			47 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			47 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			56 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			56 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			56 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			84 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			103 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}

		}

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			112 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_131 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			131 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			131 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			131 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }

		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			140 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		days_remove = 30

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }

			150 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_159 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			159 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			159 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			159 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			168 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_178 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			178 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			178 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			178 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_187 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			187 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			187 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			187 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			196 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_206 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			206 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			206 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT

		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			206 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_215 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			215 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			215 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			215 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		available = {

				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			234 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_243 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			243 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			243 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			243 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_262 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			262 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			262 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			262 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			271 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			271 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			271 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			factor = 1

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			299 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }

			318 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5

		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			327 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				is_owned_by = ROOT

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_346 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			346 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			346 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			346 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5

		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			355 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 15

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_374 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			374 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			374 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			374 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			383 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
