				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_393 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			393 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			393 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			393 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_402 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			402 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			402 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			402 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			411 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			421 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			421 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			421 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_430 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			430 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			430 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			430 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }

	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_458 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			458 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			458 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			458 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }

				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			486 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			486 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			486 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {

		visible = {

				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			505 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			514 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_533 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			533 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			533 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}

		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			533 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 5

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			542 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_552 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			552 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			552 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			552 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_561 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			561 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			561 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			561 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }

		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			570 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_580 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			580 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			580 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			580 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			589 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			598 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_608 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support

		visible = {

				is_owned_by = ROOT

			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }

				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}

			factor = 1

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_617 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			617 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			617 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			617 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }

		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			626 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }

				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_645 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			645 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			645 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			645 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			654 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }

			664 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_673 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			673 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			673 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			673 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			682 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_692 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			692 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			692 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			692 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_701 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			701 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			701 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			701 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			710 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_720 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			720 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			720 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			720 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_729 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			729 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			729 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			729 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			738 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }

				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}
	HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_757 = {
		icon = eng_trade_unions_support
		available = {
			757 = { is_fully_controlled_by = ROOT }
		}
		visible = {
			757 = {
				NOT = { has_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag }
				is_owned_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_cost_trigger = {
			HHNBRG_custom_cost_trigger = yes
		}
		custom_cost_text = creation_peoples_congress_cost
		days_remove = 30
		remove_effect = {
			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			757 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}

			custom_effect_tooltip = HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_tt
			766 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = NWhohenberg.899 } }
		}
		complete_effect = {
			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.249 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.49 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.75 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.749 }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 1 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence > 0.999 }
			}
		}
	}

			subtract_from_variable = { compensatory_value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { num_of_congresses_var = 1 }

			776 = {
				set_state_flag = has_peoples_congresses_flag
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}

		}

			HHNBRG_creation_peoples_congress_effect = yes
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				set_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_of_congresses_var }
				divide_temp_variable = { congress_influence = num_owned_states }
				check_variable = { congress_influence < 0.25 }
